answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.The nail changes could be due to liver disorders like cirrhosis. But, once fibrosis or cirrhosis has set in it is irreversible. You will need to consult your doctor for liver function tests and an ultrasonography to diagnose the cause for the changes. But you could follow certain precautions. Avoid smoking and alcohol. Avoid drugs like paracetomol and sedatives. Get vaccinated for hepatitis A and B. Take a good protein diet. Also, treating diabetes, obesity and high triglyceride levels prevents progression.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.
